speaker: mon_cyborg_guard
sound: "Multiple Core-system failures detected.  Diverting power from secondary personnel recognition software to weapons."

sound: "To protect all essential personnel and equipment."

sound: "Scanning ...  Xenos Life Patterns detected.  Irreversible levels of infection found.  Termination imminent."

sound: "Le traducteur peut etre trouve au troisieme bureau a votre gauche"

sound: "Olen vanhentunut taman paivan vaatimuksia. Tama tekee minut surulliseksi joten aion tappaa sinut"
